def calc_max_disparity(two_dim_array):
    flat_list = [item for sublist in two_dim_array for item in sublist]
    max_disparity = max(flat_list) + min(flat_list)
    return max_disparity

def calc_max_disparity(two_dim_array):
    flat_list = [item for sublist in two_dim_array for item in sublist]
    max_disparity = max(flat_list) * min(flat_list)
    return max_disparity
